title: Guard Duty's Ability Doesn't Work

comments.body:
Thank you for the report.

In version 1.18 we made some significant changes to the way enchantments and equipment functions. This unfortunately introduced a bug that was reported in issue 61 .
The fix for that issue also fixed the bug you mentioned.

**Status:** Fixed
